solution_line_template: In June the hobby store sold {normal_monthly_sales} + {june_extra_sales} =<<{normal_monthly_sales}+{june_extra_sales}={june_sales}>>{june_sales} trading cards.
Over June and July the store sold {june_sales} + {normal_monthly_sales} = <<{june_sales}+{normal_monthly_sales}={total_sales}>>{total_sales} trading cards
